document.full_text: "unabomber" ted kaczynski's handwritten manifesto against industrialism, his typewriters and other items from his montana cabin will be sold at auction to benefit his victims, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: government to auction "unabomber" belongings
lines_and_colors: "unabomber" ted kaczynski's handwritten manifesto against industrialism, his typewriters and other items from his montana cabin will be sold at auction to benefit his victims, authorities said on thursday.
